attributes.action: Do not switch off Ceefax when digital switch-over is complete
attributes.additional_details:
When the analogue service is switched off the Ceefax service on the BBC will also be removed. This is a vital link for information; not just the latest news but also things like weather maps,lottery news, travel information, live cricket/football scores etc. Not everyone has access to a computer and this includes younger people not just the elderly.
This avenue of information NEEDS to be kept open.
Act NOW before it is too late.
